title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.13 - Wharf demurrage, small watercraft charges, responsibility for
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.13 - Wharf demurrage, small watercraft charges, responsibility for

State Regulations

In the case of watercraft of 220 feet in length or under, charges for wharf demurrage are assessed against the vessel's owner, agent, or
operator except wharf demurrage applying to lumber and forest products which
are assessed against the owners thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1244.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
